'''Arataki's Demonic Deputy''' is [[Kuki Shinobu]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Shinobu's hair is held up in a messy ponytail with a thick dark reddish rope and a dark hairpiece with gold accents. In addition to this, Shinobu has messy bangs and wears a strapless dark grey mask that covers the lower portion of her face.

Shinobu's outfit consists of dark colored cropped top exposing part of her midriff, matching dark shorts, and a black belt decorated with a thick red rope tied into a bow. Over this, Shinobu wears a cropped dark purple red and gold-trimmed hooded jacket with a buckle, dark gloves that leave certain fingers exposed and thigh-high legwear with red armor plating. Shinobu's outfit is decorated with a number of gold and red accents and trinkets and more thick red ropes, most notably around her chest area. In addition to this, Shinobu wears a single samurai plate over her left shoulder, where her Electro [[Vision]] is attached.
